== Who I am ==
I live in Portland, Oregon, and am currently employed by <nowiki>[[http://www.canonical.com | Canonical Ltd.]]</nowiki> as an <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-security | Ubuntu Security Engineer]]</nowiki>, starting in August, 2010. Prior to that, I was also employed by Canonical Ltd. as an <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~sru-verification | Ubuntu QA Stable Release Engineer]]</nowiki> beginning in May 2008. My <nowiki>[[http://www.linkedin.com/in/stevebeattie | LinkedIn profile]]</nowiki> touches on my work history before that.

I am also a core developer and release manager for the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/apparmor | AppArmor Project]]</nowiki>.
